body: Nit on this error message and others: there isn't a *fundamental* reason why tensors need to be contiguous to be copied; it's just an incidental fact that the implementation doesn't support it. This is not important now, but may become more important later when we start mixing strided and non-strided tensors in Caffe2 world.
